meanings.definition: A small dome-like structure on top of a building.
meanings.sent1: The cupolas on the church were painted white.
meanings.sent2: The old farmhouse had beautiful cupolas on its roof.
meanings.sent3: The cupolas on the school looked like tiny hats.
meanings.sent4: The cupolas dotted the skyline like miniature castles.
meanings.sent5: The golden cupolas gleamed in the sunlight, attracting everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A rounded roof or ceiling resembling a dome.
meanings.sent1: The cupolas of the barn were made of red tiles.
meanings.sent2: The theater's cupolas added elegance to the interior design.
meanings.sent3: The cupolas in the gymnasium made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: The cupolas above us seemed to embrace the entire space.
meanings.sent5: The cupolas' curves created a sense of warmth and comfort in the room.

meanings.definition: A small, decorative structure on top of a larger building.
meanings.sent1: The cupolas on the mansion were adorned with intricate carvings.
meanings.sent2: The cupolas on the castle were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent3: The cupolas on the library made it look like a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: The cupolas on the tower stood out like crowns on a king.
meanings.sent5: The cupolas were the cherry on top of the building, making it truly majestic.
